sentence.Network_en: Saint - Germain French Restaurant is a vibrant brasserie and bar at 1 st floor of Colorful Days Hotel.
sentence.Network_cn: 胜日门餐厅是一个充满活力的小酒馆和一楼有一个花样年华的酒吧.

sentence.Network_en: If you want to have a try, you can come to Brasserie Flo Beijing.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(B) ... brassed off 厌烦 brasserie 啤酒店 brassie 高尔夫球杆.
至于一楼是在巴黎随处可见的法式小酒馆(brasserie)，提供轻便而简单的单点，如沙拉或Pasta，以巴黎目前最受欢迎的餐点为主，供 …
而一些出售简餐的餐厅或者啤酒屋（Brasserie）在非用餐时间也会作为咖啡馆经营。因此，巴黎这种既象咖啡馆又似餐厅的“暧mei场 …
还可以选择在咖啡馆（cafe）, 啤酒馆（brasserie）, 面包房（boulangerie）或快餐店（fast-food）用餐。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: French, originally brewery', from brasser 'to brew'

entry.def: A brasserie is a small and usually cheap restaurant or bar.

means.word_mean: 1. a small restaurant serving beer and wine as well as food; usually cheap
